leg.name: leg
leg.transformationDescription:
A layer of short, pig-like hair quickly grows over [npc.her] legs as they shift into a new form. As [npc.her] new hair spreads down to [npc.her] feet, [npc.her] toes suddenly push together, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a cry as they transform into thick, hoof-like nails, making [npc.her] feet look very similar to a pig's hoofs. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new fur smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] anthropomorphic, [style.boldPig(pig-like legs and hoofed feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are formed into anthropomorphic pig-like hoofs.
